conversion_verification.notes: The 3D render clearly shows visible wall height, thickness, perceivable depth in rooms, an angled view, and the roof is removed to show the interior.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Walls have height and thickness (5/5). Floors are separate (3/3). Interior volume is perceivable (4/4). Wall corner geometry is proper (3/3). Angled view (5/5). Interior visible from elevated perspective (3/3). Some minor perspective distortion is present (1/2). Roof removed cleanly (5/5). Interior spaces fully visible (3/3). Clean geometry with some minor issues, e.g., the front-most part of the covered patio and adjacent wall (1/2).

geometric_accuracy.notes: The number of rooms is correct (3/3). Adjacency relationships are mostly correct, but the covered patio in the front is not accurately represented, losing some points (3/4). Relative room proportions are well-preserved (3/3). Major room identities match (2/2). Major wall positions generally align well (5/5). Wall lengths are proportional (3/3). Internal partitions are mostly correct, but some minor walls, like the one separating the two bathrooms, seem to have slightly different geometry (1/2). Doors are present and on correct walls (4/4). Windows are present and on correct walls, but some window placements and sizes are approximations (1/2). Openings are proportionally sized and oriented, though some finer details are missing (1/2).

interior_elements.notes: Major furniture is present in most rooms, though not all pieces from the 2D plan are distinctly modeled (4/4). Kitchen elements are present (2/2). Bathroom fixtures are present (2/2). Furniture is placed in correct rooms (3/3). Furniture scale is reasonable (2/2). Orientation is logical (2/2).

visual_clarity.notes: Walls, floors, and openings are clearly distinguishable (4/4). Geometry is readable and not confusing (4/4). Interior is clearly visible (3/3). Lighting does not obscure geometry (3/3). Consistent material usage (2/2). No major rendering artifacts or broken meshes (2/2). Clean background/presentation without text labels (2/2).

detected_errors.description: The 'Covered Patio' area at the front left of the house appears significantly altered or simplified in the 3D model compared to the 2D plan, especially the angular wall section and the entrance to the Nook.
Some window placements and sizes are approximations and do not perfectly match the 2D plan. For example, the windows in the 'Nook' and 'Master Bath' are different.
The wall structure for the 'Covered Patio' at the bottom appears different in the 3D model; specifically, the angular wall section on the 2D plan is missing in the 3D render.

The 'WC' room and adjacent master bath features in the 2D are not perfectly replicated in the 3D, and the wall between the two bathrooms (Bath and Master Bath) is not perfectly aligned with the 2D plan.

summary: The 3D transformation is successful, providing good geometric fidelity and clear visualization, though it has some notable discrepancies in exterior and certain interior wall configurations and window placements.
